headline: Invitation Homes Announces Tax Treatment of 2024 Dividends
summary: DALLAS, January 23, 2025--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company") today announced the tax treatment of its 2024 dividends for its Common Stock as summarized in the table below. The Company’s tax return for 2024 has not yet been filed. As a result, the information in the table below has been calculated using the best available information as of the date of this release.

headline: Seek Shelter: 3 Resilient Residential REITs
summary: Markets like the Sunbelt are exceptionally well-positioned for long-term growth. Check out three of the most resilient rental REITs.
